Header: Protest continues against Mahinda Rajapakse in Malaysia
Content: Former president Mahinda Rajapaksa says that the strength and commitment by political parties will be important to strengthen democracy. He expressed these views at the international conference of Asian political parties held at the Putra World Trade Centre at Kuala Lumpur in Malaysia. At the same time, several Tamil Diaspora organizations in Malaysia staged a protest against the former president in Kuala Lumpur today.
